hoursComment: 150 seconds * 60 seconds in a minute * 60 minutes in an hour == 0.042 (auto rounded on read and write)
idComment: Optional, will be auto generated from the 'hours' field if absent

items.itemComment: Same format as /give, this is required

items.name: Very Sharp Sword
items.comments: Amount, Damage and Name are optional, the format of enchantments are <enchantname>:<level>
